noProxyMsg.message: The CENO Client is not active. Please make sure you have started it before activating this extension.

intercepts.message: this extension intercepts requests for sites using HTTPS

securedByCeno.message: to prevent your browser from encrypting them. You are still secured by CENO.

aboutEQ.message: develops open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security, and information management.
